author: Reuters Editorial
title: PRESS DIGEST- Canada-Feb 21
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - The following are the top stories from selected Canadian newspapers. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
THE GLOBE AND MAIL ** The B.C. budget aims to temper the province's hot housing market but neither the government nor other observers know what the impact on real estate prices will be. ( tgam.ca/2BG2vlz )
** Ontario is planning to impose hard limits on solitary confinement in its prisons - one of a series of proposals contained in a new corrections bill in the works since the plight of a Lac Seul First Nations inmate came to light in 2016. ( tgam.ca/2omhZmE )
** Hyundai Auto Canada will enable its dealers to conduct full sales online, allowing customers to preorder cars, put down deposits, build-and-price online, get a trade-in Quote: on their current vehicle, schedule a test drive and fill out credit paperwork. tgam.ca/2CaDLD3
NATIONAL POST ** Ottawa Valley MPP Randy Hillier intensified his campaign against former Progressive Conservative leader Patrick Brown on Tuesday, reporting him to the provincial integrity commissioner for alleged ethics violations. bit.ly/2okVdeB
Compiled by Bengaluru newsroom
